..\\common\\core.json.title: core
..\\common\\core.json.description: The base properties used in all top-level types

type.description: Hardcoded value to indicate what type of construct this is

id.description: Globally unique identifier for this construct.

revision.description: The revision number of this construct. MUST be omitted if this is the first version, otherwise required.

created_at.description: Time at which this construct was created.

external_ids.description: A list of external identifiers by which this construct may be known.

source.description: The source of this ID, i.e. name of an external system.

link.description: A link to this construct in the external system

producer_ref.description: ID to the information source that produced this content

marking_refs.description: The set of markings to be applied to this construct

structured_markings.description: The set of L2 markings to be applied to this construct

structured-marking.title: structured-marking
structured-marking.description: A single definition of a structured marking

controlled_structures.description: A list of JSONPath statements, rooted at the top-level object that the structured_markings key is contained in, that the marking_refs apply to.

marking_refs.description: The set of markings applied to the fields selected by the controlled_structures.

controlled_structures.description: A list of JSONPath statements, rooted at the top-level object that the structured_markings key is contained in, that the marking_refs apply to.

marking_refs.description: The set of markings applied to the fields selected by the controlled_structures.

reference_type.description: An enum detailing what type of information is referenced

reference_title.description: A human-readable title for this object

reference_url.description: A URL pointing to a copy of the documentation that the reference refers to

analysis_by_ref.description: A direct reference containing the Object ID of the Identity who produced or performed the analysis contained in the referenced document. This is not the Identity of who created the STIX Object, but is who performed the analaysis contained in the referenced document. This Object is not related using a Relationship Object as an intermediatary

..\\common\\impact.json.description: The impact on operations if this construct were to be realized.

level.description: The estimated severity of the impact.

description.description: A prose description of the impact.

credibility.description: The credibility of this statement, using the Admirality scale
